ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron eyed their enthusiasm. You see Shockwave, these are the idealist warriors we could have used more of on Cybertron. Megatron turned to Shockwave.

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron eyed their enthusiasm. "You see Shockwave, these are the
idealist warriors we could have used more of on Cybertron." Megatron
turned to Shockwave. "What is your suggestion with this infiltrator."
Megatron asked pointing at the captured Slaughter, knowing Shockwave's
logic was flawless.
